name: The Astonishing Captain Skull
description:
A mysterious death on a planet full of ghosts draws the investigative powers of the amazing Captain Skull. 

Short detective mystery made in Adventure Game Studio and released July 2010. Music credits in readme, toggle fullscreen with winsetup.exe. As of 2022, works best in compatability mode for Windows XP.

Controls:

Leftclick - Walk, interact

Rightclick - Examine

Esc - Menu

Click the 'items' and 'notes' icons on the bottom left of the screen to open up the item and note inventories respectively.
